name: treatment of sewage sludge, 97% water, WWT-SLF, wood ash mixture, pure, landfarming | organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29516/documentation

The process represents the treatment of landfarming of a waste (sewage sludge) that is exclusively generated in another waste treatment. Sewage sludge with 97% water is generated during wastewater treatement (WWT) of leachate from the sanitary landfilling (SLF) of 'wood ash mixture, pure' . Recommended use of this dataset: to be used within the specific chain of treatments for 'wood ash mixture, pure'. Share of biogenic carbon in the sludge: 28.13%.

The activity starts with the waste being available for landfarming. Collection and transportation of the waste to this process is not included.

The activity ends with the waste being treated and waste-specific emissions from the landfarming process are released to the environment (air, water and soil). The activity is considering local fate of emissions and the initial specific wastewater composition (generating the sewage sludge). Further, it includes provision of fertiliser functions for N, P, K, if present in the sludge.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The site has mean annual temperature (MAT) of 10.403 degC, mean annual precipitation (MAP) of 960.474141305017 mm/year, mean annual actual evaporation (EAT) of 450.073365823956 mm/year. Climate will influence the local fate emissions based on the elemental composition of the sludge as well as water evaporation to air (= consumptive water use).;References:;UN data, 2020. Precipitation, Environment Statistics Database, United Nations Statistics Division Available at: http://data.un.org/Data.aspx?q=precipitation&d=ENV&f=variableID%3a6; World Bank, 2022. Surface area (sq.km), World Bank Group Available at: https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/AG.SRF.TOTL.K2
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Landfarming is the process of spreading a substrate on agricultural soil. Sewage sludge is generated in the leachate treatment generated from sanitary landfilling of 'wood ash mixture, pure'. Spreading of liquid sewage sludge (97w% water content) on agricultural fields with mobile vacuum tanker.

exchanges.description: gross fertilizer function provided from sewage sludge spreading on agricultural fields.

flow.name: organic potassium fertiliser, as K2O
flow.category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production
